mapper.insert: insert into u_tbl (u_id, u_name, u_pw, u_zipcode, u_addr, u_addr_dtl, u_phone, u_nic, check_email_rx, u_grade, u_pts, join_date, modify_date, last_login_date) values (#{u_id}, #{u_name}, #{u_pw}, #{u_zipcode}, #{u_addr}, #{u_addr_dtl}, #{u_phone}, #{u_nic}, #{check_email_rx}, #{u_grade}, #{u_pts}, #{sysdate}, #{sysdate}, #{sysdate})
